articles.title: Ukraine targets Russian soldiers accused of threatening nuclear plant - ABC News
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy warns Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base will become a "special target" for Ukrainian forces.

articles.author: Ian O'Riordan
articles.title: Paul O'Donovan and Fintan McCarthy entertain off the water after dominating on it - The Irish Times
articles.description: Cork duo Paul O'Donovan and Fintan McCarthy defend their European Championship title in the lightweight double sculls
articles.content:
One of these days Paul ODonovan might let his guard down and slip in something serious and maybe then we will know whether Fintan McCarthy is laughing with him or at him.
All that is certain for now… [+5814 chars]

articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy has warned Russian soldiers who shoot at Europe's largest nuclear power station or use it as a base to shoot from that they will become a "special target" for Ukrainian forces.
